name: esp-lowcode-matter-v0.6
onCreateCommand: apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y git wget flex bison gperf python3 python3-pip python3-venv cmake ninja-build ccache libffi-dev libssl-dev dfu-util libusb-1.0-0 libcairo2-dev
postCreateCommand: cd /workspace && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/espressif/esp-idf.git -b release/v5.3 && cd /workspace/esp-idf && git submodule update --init && ./install.sh esp32c6 && . ./export.sh && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/chiragatal/esp-amp.git -b main && cd /workspace/esp-amp && export ESP_AMP_PATH=/workspace/esp-amp && cd /workspace/esp-lowcode-matter && ./install.sh && . ./export.sh
